string-array.name: detectionOptionsDescriptions
string-array.item: This example presents the Face Detector\'s default implementation.
This example presents the Document Detector\'s default implementation.
This example presents the Barcode Detector\'s default implementation.
This example presents the old Liveness Detector\'s default implementation.

This example presents the new Liveness Detector\'s default implementation, including the default user interface for challenge presentation. \n\nFor the best results, remove your glasses, make long and fluid motions, and conduct this detection in a well-lit environment.
This example presents a Document Detector implementation for custom quality indication, providing separate and specific quality parameter indications.
This example presents a Face Detector implementation with a customized control view.

This example presents a custom Liveness detection implementation that overrides the default implementation entirely.\n\nFor the best results, remove your glasses, make long and fluid motions, and conduct this detection in a well-lit environment.
